channel.title: Please help with no-ip
channel.description: I am confused with no-ip. I downloaded the thing and created my account. My ip thing is daylon.no-ip.org. But now that I have it how do i make it so people can log into my server when it is running? Please help!!!

item.title: Please help with no-ip
item.dc:creator: @pk_for_me pk for me
item.description:

hm… maybe u r like 10-13 and u have router which your mum wont let you use…? same here i onyl use hamachi *(alot easier)
